verses.roman:
dagdhvā vārāṇasīṁ sarvāṁ
viṣṇoś cakraṁ sudarśanam
bhūyaḥ pārśvam upātiṣṭhat
kṛṣṇasyākliṣṭa-karmaṇaḥ

synonyms: dagdhvā—having burned; vārāṇasīm—Vārāṇasī; sarvām—all; viṣṇoḥ—of Lord Viṣṇu; cakram—the disc; sudarśanam—Sudarśana; bhūyaḥ—once again; pārśvam—the side; upātiṣṭhat—went to; kṛṣṇasya—of Kṛṣṇa; akliṣṭa—without trouble or fatigue; karmaṇaḥ—whose actions.
translation: After burning down the entire city of Vārāṇasī, Lord Viṣṇu's Sudarśana cakra returned to the side of Śrī Kṛṣṇa, whose actions are effortless.
